Uses of Package
com.vectorprint.report.data

  • Packages that use com.vectorprint.report.data 
    Package Description
    com.vectorprint.report
    interface for the generation of reports
    com.vectorprint.report.data
    interfaces to support the process of collecting data for reports
    com.vectorprint.report.itext
    primary classes for building iText reports; typically one will first study the possibilities of styling and annotating existing dataclasses, extend DataCollectorImpl and use ReportRunner to run the report.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style
    interfaces and classes to support configurable styling of iText reporting elements in a css like manner.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers
    Parametrizable classes responsible for styling.
    com.vectorprint.report.running
    interface for building reports (independent from iText) and two ready to use implementations.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.data used by com.vectorprint.report 
    Class and Description
    DataCollectionMessages
    The idea is that in the datacollection phase faults and notifications can be set that will be dealt with by a ReportGenerator
    ReportDataHolder
    Container for data also holding messages that were produced when collecting the data.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.data used by com.vectorprint.report.data 
    Class and Description
    BlockingDataCollector.QUEUECONTROL
    Signals the end of the data stream to the queue consumer
    DataCollectionMessages
    The idea is that in the datacollection phase faults and notifications can be set that will be dealt with by a ReportGenerator
    DataCollectionMessages.Level
    severity
    DataCollector
    To generate a report we first need to collect data.
    DataCollectorImpl
    Default implementation of a DataCollector, uses ReportDataHolderImpl as generic parameters
    ReportDataHolder
    Container for data also holding messages that were produced when collecting the data.
    ReportDataHolder.IdData
    holder to keep track of an optional user provided id for data
    ReportDataHolderImpl
    Holder for data for reports, you can annotate classes of data Objects you add using Element and DataType to easily create and style report parts and format your data.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.data used by com.vectorprint.report.itext 
    Class and Description
    DataCollectionMessages
    The idea is that in the datacollection phase faults and notifications can be set that will be dealt with by a ReportGenerator
    ReportDataAware 
    ReportDataHolder
    Container for data also holding messages that were produced when collecting the data.
    ReportDataHolder.IdData
    holder to keep track of an optional user provided id for data
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.data used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style 
    Class and Description
    ReportDataAware 
    ReportDataHolder
    Container for data also holding messages that were produced when collecting the data.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.data used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers 
    Class and Description

    ReportDataHolder
    Container for data also holding messages that were produced when collecting the data.
